content.en:
We were proud to join the FOSDEM 2015 as speakers in the Graph processing room !

We presented manylines, a graph web publication platform with storytelling features. You'll find in our presentation a guided tour of the sexual behaviours wikipedia articles network !

And an hour later, Alexis Jacomy presented sigma.js new version which was developped partly at médialab ! Alexis performed a great live-coding session to illustrate what one can achieve with a few lines of codes with sigma.js.
